name: Escape the hole (ExistentialVapor)
description:
A quick game for the untitled game jam.

Escape a giant that you fell into, your character is only able to jump.

CONTROLS:

Mouse: Aim the trajectory of your jump

Mouse1 (Hold) : Charge the jump

Mouse1(Release): Jump

ESC: Pause

ASSETS USED:

Tilemap : https://aamatniekss.itch.io/lava-caves-tileset
